product_name: Natrapel Picaridin Insect Repellent - 5 fl. oz.
long_description: Don't let biting insects ruin your outdoor adventures! DEET-free Natrapel picaridin insect repellent keeps bugs away so you can play! 20% picaridin solution provides 8 hrs. of protection from mosquitoes, black flies and ticks. Eco-Spray(R) bottle uses a patented mechanical delivery system to create an aerosol-like spray for easy application. Formula is safe to use around synthetic clothing and will not harm fishing line.
short_description: Don't let biting insects ruin your outdoor adventures! DEET-free Natrapel picaridin insect repellent keeps bugs away so you can play!
